items.q: My brothers and sisters ____________________ students.
Q: ____________________ from Japan? A: Yes, he is.
Q: ____________________ from the same country? A: No, we aren't.
Q: Am I your best friend? A: Yes, ____________________.
Q: Is English easy for Ali? A: No, ____________________.
Mrs. Kwon isn't here. Where ____________________?
That is a strange flower. What ____________________ ?
Are we late for class? What time ____________________?
The dog is outside. ____________________ is outside.
Math and science are my favorite subjects. ____________________ are my favorite subjects.
Linda ____________________ (live / lives) with her sister.
They ____________________ (eat / eats) in the cafeteria every day.
Senators ____________________ (work / works) in Washington, D.C.
Luis uses a computer. He ____________________ it every day.
My sister lives in a house. I____________________ in an apartment.
I go to the movies every Friday. You ____________________ every Friday, too.
Q: ____________________ Linda have a dog? A: No, she doesn't.
Q: ____________________ ____________________ she get married? A: Because she's too young.
Q: ____________________ ____________________ Senator Smith come from? A: He’s from Alabama.
Q: ____________________ ____________________ they pay taxes? A: They don’t pay taxes because they don’t make any money.
Who ____________________ she live with?
Where____________________ the government’s offices?
Who ____________________ your senator?
Q: Do carpenters use hammers? A: Yes, ____________________.
Q: Does Linda drink coffee? A: No, ____________________.
Q: When ____________________? A: Class starts at 9:00.
Q: Why ____________________? A: I drink coffee because I like it.
I don't eat meat. I ____________________ eat meat.
I watch TV news once or twice a week. I ____________________ watch TV news.
I get up at 8:00 seven days a week. I ____________________ get up at 8:00.
I use the computer to do my homework several days a week. I ____________________ use the computer to do my homework.
I only drink coffee ____________________ the morning.
I like to ski ____________________ the winter.
The cat likes to go out ____________________ night.
New Year’s Day is __________ (in / on) January 1st.
St. Patrick’s Day is __________ (at / in) March.
My dog ____ black and white. a. am c. are b. is d. be
Baker Community College ____ a small college. a. am c. are b. is d. be
Choose the correct sentence. a. My book on the desk is. c. My book is on the desk. b. On the desk is my book.
Choose the correct sentence. a. Are expensive new cars. c. Expensive are new cars. b. New cars are expensive.
The son and daughter are in high school. ____ are good children. a. I b. He c. She d. We e. They
You and I are from Mexico. ____ are native speakers of Spanish. a. I b. He c. She d. We e. They
I am a student. ____ am in Ms. Claflin's class. a. I b. He c. She d. We e. They
Ms. Claflin is a good teacher. ____ is from New York City. a. I b. He c. She d. We e. They
I live ____ 79 Main Street. a. in c. at b. on d. from
Q: ____ is Tran from? A: He's from Vietnam. a. Where c. How b. Why d. How old
Q: ____ is it? A: It's green. a. What day c. What color b. What time d. What
Q: ____ is that dictionary? A: It's $10.00. a. How long c. How much b. How tall d. How old
Q: ____ is Maria? A: She's fine. a. How c. What b. How old d. How long
Q: Do they have a dog? A: Yes, they ____. a. have c. do b. are d. does
Q: Does Linda need help? A: No, she ____. a. don't c. isn't b. doesn't d. aren't
Q: Are your children at home? A: Yes, they ____. a. are c. do b. aren't d. does
Q: Does he live in France? A: No, he ____. a. is c. isn't b. don't d. doesn't
Q: Does he work for the government? A: No, he _____. a. isn’t c. don’t b. aren’t d. doesn’t
Q: Do some people get income tax refunds? A: Yes, they _____. a. am c. do b. is d. does
march / never / in parades / they
wears green / on St. Patrick’s Day / usually / he
the teacher / ever / eat / does / in the cafeteria
100% of the time
90% of the time
50% of the time
10% of the time
0% of the time
We studied __________ noon until 5:00.
I have a doctor's appointment __________ Thursday.
The class goes from 1:00 __________ 2:00.
I seldom go to bed __________ midnight.
